title: It’s in the Bag (restored, colorized) (1945, comedy, imdb score: 6.7)

sources.title: It’s in the Bag (restored, colorized) (1945, comedy, imdb score: 6.7)
sources.description: It's in the Bag! is a 1945 comedy film featuring Fred Allen in his only starring film role. The film was released by United Artists at a time when Allen was at the peak of his fame as one of the most popular radio comedians. The film has been preserved by UCLA Film & Television Archive.
